TextLibrary.Text: GENERAL TARN
The Gamma Sphere is gone, General.
The Gamma Sphere is gone, General.
Very good. I see a bright future for you, young man, once we conclude this deal and the asset is handed over to me.
Very good. I see a bright future for you, young lady, once we conclude this deal and the asset is handed over to me.
After all she's done for us, you still want Beta Prime?
After all she's done for us, you still want Beta Prime?
That was our agreement. You'll be well-rewarded when she's brought to me. My fleet will be waiting in the Plasmia System.
That was our agreement. You'll be well-rewarded when she's brought to me. My fleet will be waiting in the Plasmia System.
I understand, General.
I understand, General.
Will you hand me over to Trident?
Will you hand me over to Trident?
I don't want to, Beta...
I don't want to, Beta...
Do what needs to be done. I will accept your decision either way. If you decide to let me go then drop me off at Acheron Prime. I would like to meet this Spirit.
Do what needs to be done. I will accept your decision either way. If you decide to let me go then drop me off at Acheron Prime. I would like to meet this Spirit.
No human could survive on that planet.
No human could survive on that planet.
You forget... I am not a normal human.
You forget... I am not a normal human.
